Zinzy Waleson Geene

About

Heya, I'm Zinzy, and I've been yelling at Internet clouds since 1997. I'm an IndieWeb enthusiast, and a Design Manager making tools for people at work. A senior-but-silly researcher-designer, I love to learn new things. Welcome to my website, where I come to link and think.
